TopicTitle: Ace combat inspire jets: Nosferatu and Fenrir (ADX-02 Morgon)

Articles.Content:
I got bored, and real life jets are LAME, so I made some ace combat jets

Nosferatu:

Flight characteristics:

Has a strong TWR of 5.81. very limited to fuel as for only 1 fuel tank per turbojet.

wieghts 7.4 tons

duel advance reaction wheels gives some control to post stall situations

A friend describe it as "very fast"

low wingspan gives limited room to weapons.

Fenrir (Base on the morgon):

Laser gun not included

Flight characteristics:

negative G turns makes me die

Both ships are just over 60 parts.

Craft download

Nosferatu

Fenrir
